name: Vishal Industrial
overview:
Inaugurated in the year 1982, at Delhi (India), we, “Vishal Industrial Corporation”, are occupied in manufacturing and supplying a qualitative assortment of Wall Mixer Piston Assembly, Tipton For Wall Mixer Spout, Tipton For Concealed Diverter, Sanitary Fitting Turned Component, Nipple For Sink Cock, Brass Dowel Nut, Self Closing High Flow Tipton and Brass Pendulums. These are manufactured using the finest grade raw material and sophisticated technology at our hi-tech manufacturing unit. Apart from this, our offered assortment is widely appreciated among our esteemed clients due to their easy installation, low maintenance, sturdiness, high durability, excellent finish and corrosion resistance.

Our Infrastructure: Our infrastructural facility covers a large area of land and is divided into various specialized units like manufacturing, quality testing, research & development, sales and marketing, etc. Our production division is hi-tech and is installed with latest requisite machines that are necessary for manufacturing high quality products within the specified time frame. Due to our well-organized infrastructure, we have been able to meet the varied expectations and requirements of our valuable customers.

Our Customers: We have developed a loyal client base in the national market backed by our ability to meet their requirements promptly. Our customers have shown enormous faith on us and have placed constant orders appreciating our efforts to meet their expectations.

Client Satisfaction: We make our best efforts to provide high quality of products to our customers. A strict process of testing is followed and the goods are checked at every step.All the finished goods are water tested before dispatch.

Our Quality Assurance: At Vishal Industrial Corporation, quality is the result of high goal, honest effort and practiced implementation. Our policy aims at improving all the aspects of our activities to ensure that our offered products satisfy customer’s expectations.

Our Products: Tipton For Concealed Diverter Sanitary Fitting Turned Component Self Closing High Flow Tipton Brass Pendulums
